articles.author: Jay Stahl
articles.title: Katy Perry's new album '143' is 'mindless' and 'uninspired,' per critics. What happened? - USA TODAY
articles.description: Katy Perry's album "143" is here following her "American Idol" departure. Here's why critics are calling her album "mindless" and "uninspired."
articles.content:
Katy Perry was expected to roar back into pop superstardom with her new album "143." But critics are calling the record "mindless" and "uninspired."
The popstar left the "American Idol" judging pane… [+5075 chars]
